statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 70
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 70 ORDER BY humidity ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT date, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE DATE(date) = '2022-01-15' AND precipitation < 0.5 ORDER BY precipitation ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 OR (humidity > 80 AND precipitation > 0.1) ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC, precipitation ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE humidity + precipitation > 1.5 ORDER BY date ASC, humidity DESC, precipitation ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT id, date FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE irrigation_zone = 1
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, date, duration FROM irrigation_schedule ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, humidity, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE duration > 30 AND irrigation_zone = 2 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 22 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY humidity DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT id, date, watering_time FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT id, crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01' AND crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT id, watering_time FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE watering_amount > 2.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data JOIN crop_data ON weather_data.date = crop_data.planting_date WHERE temperature > 28 AND crop_data.crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY temperature DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE rainfall > 5;
SELECT date, crop_type FROM FieldMonitoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ph_level, nutrient_levels FROM SoilAnalysis WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, date, duration_hours FROM IrrigationSchedule ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT id, date, duration_hours FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE moisture_level < 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, date, area, crop_type FROM FieldMonitoring WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, ph_level, nutrient_levels FROM SoilAnalysis WHERE ph_level BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.0;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData
SELECT Temperature, Humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE Date = '2023-05-12'
SELECT Zone, DurationInMinutes FROM IrrigationSchedule ORDER BY Date DESC
SELECT SensorID, Location, Status FROM FieldSensors WHERE Status = 'Active'
SELECT CropID, CropName, PlantingDate, HarvestDate FROM FieldCrops WHERE HarvestDate > '2023-10-01'
SELECT Date, Temperature, Humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature > 25
SELECT Date, Zone, DurationInMinutes FROM IrrigationSchedule ORDER BY DurationInMinutes DESC
SELECT SensorID, Location, Status FROM FieldSensors WHERE Status = 'Active'
SELECT CropID, CropName, PlantingDate, HarvestDate FROM FieldCrops WHERE HarvestDate > '2022-08-01'
SELECT Date, Temperature_Min, Temperature_Max, Precipitation FROM WeatherForecast WHERE Date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30'
